name: 색채
uniques: Only available <when number of [turns] is greater than [5]>

civilopediaText.text: Ability Cards are used for giving your nation beneficial effects, each nation can only have one. This can be traded with other civlizations, but by itself doesn't provide happiness despite being a Luxury resource.

choices.text: 당신이 심연을 오랫동안 들여다본다면...심연 또한 당신을 들여다볼 것이다..
